OpenCloseMethodPair.Name: Open-Close Method Pair
OpenCloseMethodPair.Description: Activities with an 'Open' method must have a corresponding 'Close' method.

HardcodedDelay.Name: Hardcoded Delay
HardcodedDelay.Description: Activities should not use hardcoded delays (WaitForTime)

ModifiedDelayProperties.Name: Modified Delay Properties
ModifiedDelayProperties.Description: BeforeDelay and AfterDelay should be avoided, and EnableTimeout should be false

Comments.Name: Comments
Comments.Description: Each activity must have at least one comment explaining purpose of the activity.

WindowsScreenRules.Name: Windows Screen Rules
WindowsScreenRules.Description: Windows Screen match rules should follow best practices

WindowsElementRules.Name: Windows Element Rules
WindowsElementRules.Description: Enabled Windows Screen Element locators should not use path, and enabled match rules should not use path or index

ChromeScreenRules.Name: Chrome Screen Rules
ChromeScreenRules.Description: Chrome Screen match rules should follow best practices

ChromeElementRules.Name: Chrome Element Rules
ChromeElementRules.Description: Enabled Chrome Screen Element locators and JS match rules should not contain digits, and JS match rules should not use the Index property

DataTransformUsage.Name: Data Transform Usage
DataTransformUsage.Description: Executable items should not have unused datatransform code.
